work.title: Mobile Interface Design Intern
work.description: Pitched design proposals to directors of company, led UX and UI on a redesign of Hejia's mobile ERP client, working with iOS and Android developers to implement on both platforms

work.title: Project Breaker

work.title: Co-Founder

work.title: Pilot Tester

work.title: Researcher
work.description: Collaborating with a small team, audited school facilities energy usage and developed plan to reduce computer idle time (IT department accepted plan and helped with implementing), saving school $4,100 a year in electricity
